::DarrMouse/Battera::

DarkMouse::

She held up her hands, "WAIT! Don't kill that bot.  Megatron will 
want her alive.  She will be useful.  Leave her to me and Scorponok.  
Worst comes to worst, we reprogram her.  She will be a prize for 
Megatron."
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

Battera::

She looked in shock at Cybershark. "WHAT IN THE INFERNO? WHY DID YOU 
HIT HIM?! He is the friend I was telling you about.  The one I should 
have saved and fought with, when I ran from HellBeast's ship."
She looked at him with mixed emotion.  she didn't know whether to be 
mad for him hitting her old friend or happy that Cyberchark would do 
something like that for her.


--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, Dachande85@a... wrote:
> ::CyberShark::
> 
>     Hearing Voluois message he instantly got up and flew away. 
Going as fast 
> as he could he landed after a while. He say Battera talking to 
someone new, 
> he wondered if this might be the famed Voluois.
>     He walked up and punched at the guy aiming for the jaw. It was 
for all 
> the crying that he had caused Battera.
>     "Sorry for that, I needed to get it out of my system," He said 
right 
> after.
